title: Amazed by Love
overview: Kittiput is a handsome, charming and a friendly millionaire who is dating the confident designer Saruda. While actively dating with her, he bumps into his childhood friend Naweeya and slowly starts to build feelings for her. Naweeya is very close to Partit, who is a rival to Kittiput and is Saruda's first love. A complicated love story will erupt, but who will they choose in the end?
